about.title: Vietnamese Company
about.description: Based in Hanoi, you'll meet the people behind your trip – no middlemen, no extra fees. Choosing a local company means better support and giving back to the place you explore.

about.title: Team Always Ready
about.description: Tour consultants and guides — fluent in French and with years of experience — along with seamless logistics, will provide all the resources needed to ensure the success.

about.title: Local Experts
about.description: With deep knowledge of local destinations and culture, Vietnam Exploration offers journeys that go beyond sightseeing — connecting you with the people.

items.title: North
items.description: The highest area on the map of Vietnam, with the capital Hanoi

items.title: Central
items.description: The highest area on the map of Vietnam, with the capital Hanoi

items.title: South
items.description: The highest area on the map of Vietnam, with the capital Hanoi

items.name: Lana Meo
items.description: This trip was truly unforgettable. From the cloud-covered peaks of Ta Xua to vibrant local markets, I explored stunning landscapes and welcoming people. Each place brought unique memories, a meaningful journey with Vietnam Exploration. Along winding mountain passes, I witnessed endless seas of clouds, golden terraced rice fields, and hidden waterfalls. Evenings were filled with local cuisine, traditional music, and the warmth of communities that opened their doors to travelers. The combination of breathtaking scenery and authentic cultural encounters made the journey not only visually stunning but also deeply enriching. Every step revealed a new story, a fresh perspective, and a reminder of the beauty and diversity that Vietnam holds.
